Constructor - creates new skill action

Parameters:
name - name of skill
amount - amount skill adds to targetStat
cost - mana cost
duration - # of turns skill effect will last
minReq - amount of minStat needed to use skill
minStat - stat required to use skill
targetStat - stat affected by skill
range - range type (enum)
message - status message
